name: OpenAlex: Get list of references
description:
penAlex (https://openalex.org/about) is a free and open online repository of the world's research system. It includes works, authors, sources, concepts, institutions, publishers, funders, and their interconnections. As an open-source project, it requires no authentication. Each user is allowed a maximum of 100,000 API calls per day. If you need a higher limit, you can register for OpenAlex Premium (https://openalex.org/pricing).
 
This preset allows you to get a reference lists of a work defined by your seed node (e.g. https://doi.org/10.7717/peerj.4375). The result is a list containing OpenAlex IDs for works that this work cites. If you want to fetch meta data for the referenced works again, apply preset “Get a single work” again.

params.select:
id, doi, title,
display_name, publication_year, referenced_works
